descrip: Keizersgracht 107 D,  1015  CH Amsterdam   Unique  apartment (approx. 114m²) in  a  former merchant’s house on the  Keizersgracht.  “De Walvisch” is a magnificent and  excellently  maintained  nationally listed  building in the uncommon Art Deco style. The apartment is fitted with contemporary luxury whilst maintaining original details so that the rich history of the property is not forgotten.   Location/accessibility:  The stately canal property is located between the Herenstraat and the Leliegracht and has a gorgeous view out over the Keizersgracht. This is living in style in the historic city centre of Amsterdam. All of the amenities are with easy reach. The well-known Nine Streets and the Haarlemmerstraat with their wide variety of supermarkets, boutiques, characterful shops and welcoming open-air cafés and restaurants are all in the immediate vicinity. The Koningsplein, Leidsestraat, Dam and Central Station are also located close by. There is also no lack of art and culture with the Koninklijk Theater Carré, the Hermitage, the Stopera and various international museums and art galleries all adding to the advantages of living in the centre of Amsterdam.   The residence is very easy to access. As there is plenty of public transport in the immediate vicinity. Trains, trams, the metro, ferries and buses that go in every direction (also directly to Schiphol). Your car may be parked in various car parks in the neighbourhood, which include the one underneath the Stopera. Amsterdam’s city centre is literally just round the corner and the other urban districts may be reached in a few minutes on the bicycle.    Layout:  Communal and majestic entrance with the original staircase with marble stairs and a comfortable lift. The entire property has been excellently maintained.   Third floor:  Spacious hallway with access to all the rooms. Separate toilet with small sink. The double glass doors take you into the enormous living/dining room. The imposing windows allow an unusual amount of light in and offer a lovely view out over the canal. The tasteful original fireplace decorates the living room.  The open kitchen is equipped with all conceivable built-in appliances which include a 6-ring gas hob with oven, dishwasher, combi-oven and combined fridge and freezer. The kitchen is finished with a marble counter top and has a lot of storage space. The bedroom with its en-suit bathroom is situated at the rear of the residence. The luxury elements of the bedroom include a walk-in wardrobe with double doors and various built-in wardrobes.  The en-suite bathroom is fitted with a walk-in rain shower, toilet, bath and vanity unit. There is storage for the apartment in the basement. The apartment is fitted with built-in spotlights and there is a gorgeous wooden floor laid throughout the apartment   Keizersgracht:  Named after Emperor Maximilian, Arch Duke of Austria who gave Amsterdam the privilege of adding the imperial crown to its coat of arms in 1489 (Source: stadsatlas Amsterdam)   Details:  -	Apartment right of approx.114 m² (NEN2580 measurement report available)  -	Rental price €3,000.- does not include gas, water, electricity, TV or Internet  -	Storage space of approx. 7 m2 in the basement -	Deposit of two month’s rent -	Stately canal property in a former merchant’s house  -	Lift available -	View out over the Keizersgracht  -	Transfer in consultation, available immediately.

See English translation  below.   Beschikbaar  in overleg.   Uniek, geheel nieuw  gebouwd  3-laags woonhuis (woonoppervlakte 201,40m2) met  tuin  op het zuiden, eigen parkeerplaats met  elektrisch oplaadpunt  én een grote gezamenlijke binnentuin (met zelfs een groentekas! Dit hoogwaardige huis met een verrassende architectuur gekenmerkt door veel licht en ruimte geeft u de mogelijkheid om te genieten van hartje stad, maar ook om tot rust te komen. Fantastische locatie in de Weesperzijde buurt, vlakbij de Amstel!  Indeling:  Begane grond:  Via de eigen entree komt u binnen in de ruime woonkamer, via de hoge trapvide loopt u naar de aangrenzende lichte en open woonkeuken met extra zithoek uitkijkend over de tuin. Via de open keuken met hoog plafond en enorme raampartijen heeft u toegang tot de ruime groene tuin op het zuiden met twee dubbele openslaande deuren. Verder bevindt zich op deze verdieping een aparte wc met wastafel, een ruime garderobekast en veel opslagruimte.   Eerste verdieping: Via de trapvide komt u in een open entresol, ingericht als tv- en leeskamer, met grote boekenkast. Vanuit hier is middels een grote glazen schuifwand het atelier / de werkkamer bereikbaar, met ruimte voor meerdere werkplekken en een eigen, in de kastenwand weggewerkte, wasbak (eventueel ook als 4e slaapkamer te gebruiken met mogelijkheid tot aanleggen sanitair). De entresol verdieping grenst aan de vide en maakt zo verbinding met de woonkeuken.  Tweede verdieping:  Twee lichte slaapkamers aan de achterzijde te bereiken via de overloop, met uitzicht op een karakteristieke kastanjeboom. Aan de voorzijde van de verdieping bevindt zich de master bedroom met inloopkast en ensuite badkamer met wc, twee aparte wastafels, ligbad en douche. Deze badkamer is , middels een schuifdeur, te delen in twee badkamers. Via de overloop bereikt u een ruime wasruimte en een opbergkast, welke ook de installaties (WTW en CV) herbergt.   BIJZONDERHEDEN • Beschikbaar in overleg; • Volledig gemeubileerd; • Huurprijs €7000, - per maand inclusief servicekosten; • Exclusief gas/water/elektriciteit en internet; • Huurtermijn: maximaal 24 maanden; • Zeer grote binnentuin gedeeld met bewoners van het complex (middels grote poort afgesloten van openbare weg), gezamenlijke ruimten én een plantenkas; • Fijne, rustige buurt met alle stadsvoorzieningen binnen handbereik; • Om de hoek van de Amstel en op slechts een paar minuten afstand van uitvalswegen en het Amstel Station; • Zeer lichte woning met vides en grote raampartijen, waardoor bijzondere zichtlijnen ontstaan binnen de woning; • Riante leefverdieping met luxe open woonkeuken met aangrenzend de zonnige privé tuin; • Overdekte ruime fietsenstalling; • Ruime en besloten parkeergarage met EIGEN parkeerplaats, met elektrisch oplaadpunt – gekoppeld aan eigen meterkast; • Zeer geschikt voor kinderen; • De hele woning wordt voorzien van frisse lucht door een warmte terugwin ventilatie systeem (WTW);  -------------------------------------  Available in consultation.  A unique, completely newly built 3-storey house with living area of 201.40 m2, south-facing garden, private parking space with electric charging point and a large communal courtyard including a greenhouse! This high-quality home with distinctive architecture is characterised by lots of light and space and provides the opportunity to enjoy the heart of the city, yet in a tranquil setting. It is on an outstanding location in the Weesperzijde neighbourhood of Amsterdam, near the Amstel River!  Layout:  Ground floor: Through the private entrance you enter the spacious living room. Via the high staircase vide you walk to the adjacent light and open kitchen with extra seating area, overlooking the garden. Through the open kitchen with high ceiling and huge windows you have access through two double doors to the spacious green garden on the south. There is also a separate toilet with sink, a generous wardrobe and plenty of storage space on this floor.  First floor: Via the staircase you enter an open mezzanine floor, furnished as a TV and reading room, with a large bookcase. From here, the studio/office is accessed through a large glass sliding wall, with space for several workplaces. There is a sink, which is concealed in the wall cabinet. (It can also be used as a 4th bedroom with the option of installing sanitary facilities). The mezzanine floor adjoins the loft and thus connects to the kitchen/diner.  Second floor: Two bright bedrooms at the rear are accessible via the landing, overlooking a characterful chestnut tree. At the front of this floor is the master bedroom with walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom with toilet, two separate sinks, bath and shower. This bathroom can be divided into two bathrooms by means of a sliding door. Through the landing you reach a spacious laundry room and a storage cupboard, which also houses the installations (WTW and CV).  PARTICULARS • Available in consultation. • Fully furnished. • Rental price €7000 per month including service costs. • Excluding gas/water/electricity and internet. • Rental period: max 24 months. • The very large courtyard garden is shared with residents of the complex (closed off from the public road by means of a large gate), with communal areas and a greenhouse. • Nice, quiet neighborhood with all city amenities closely within reach. • Just around the corner from the Amstel River and only a few minutes away from roads and Amstel Station. • Very bright house with voids and large windows, creating special sightlines within the house. • Spacious living floor with luxurious open kitchen with adjacent sunny private garden. • Covered, spacious bicycle storage. • Large and private garage with OWN parking space, with electric charging point – linked to its own meter cabinet. • Very suitable for children. • The whole house is provided with fresh air through a heat recovery ventilation system (WTW).

See English translation  below.   “Résidence  L’Étoile” RIANT  HUREN AAN HET GELDERLANDPLEIN,  NABIJ  DE ZUIDAS.  Exclusief en  royaal  appartement van circa 197m² gelegen op  de 2e verdieping van Résidence  L’Étoile. Het appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien en gelegen aan de Van Leijenberghlaan in Résidence L’Étoile, aan het Gelderlandplein, nabij de Ringweg A-10 en de Zuidas. Het appartement beschikt over een riant terras en 3 slaapkamers.  Indeling: Om te beginnen heeft u rechtstreeks toegang tot de parkeergarage onder het gebouw en tot het moderne, overdekte winkelcentrum om uw dagelijkse boodschappen te doen.  Op de parterre, in de ruime fraaie lobby, is een portiersloge waar een portier 24 uur per dag aanwezig is om de bezoekers te ontvangen en aan te kondigen bij de bewoners.  Daarnaast beschikt Résidence L’Étoile over een PA (Personal Assistant) service. Deze neemt desgewenst een scala aan praktische werkzaamheden uit handen, van het ophangen van een schilderij tot het organiseren van verjaardagen en andere bijeenkomsten.  In Résidence L’Étoile kunt u exclusief gebruikmaken van een aantal extra faciliteiten.  Op de eerste etage is er een ruime fitnessruimte met de modernste fitnessapparatuur. Ook is er een ruimte voor onder meer schoonheidsbehandelingen, maar ook voor massages en fysiotherapie. Dus zelfs voor deze zaken hoeft u het gebouw niet meer uit.  Op de eerste etage bevinden zich ook de guestrooms. Deze zeer luxe ingerichte kamers zijn voorzien van alle comfort. Deze kunnen uitsluitend voor uw gasten worden gereserveerd.  Het appartement is gelegen op de 2e verdieping (aan de oost zijde) en is ontworpen door Piet Boon. Indeling: luxe entree, toegang tot de woonkamer met zonnig balkon en prachtig uitzicht. Luxe keuken voorzien van inbouwapparatuur. 3 slaapkamers en 2 luxe badkamers.   LIGGING:  Het ‘groene’ Buitenveldert is gelegen nabij de Zuidas, Station Zuid/WTC, luchthaven Schiphol, tussen Amsterdam-Zuid en Amstelveen. Dit is het deel van Amsterdam dat volop in ontwikkeling is. Er ontstaat een geheel nieuw internationaal zakencentrum wat een veelvoud aan voorzieningen op het gebied van winkels, horeca en andere uitgaansgelegenheden met zich meebrengt. Wonen, werken en recreëren worden gecombineerd in een dynamische en mondaine wijk met unieke infrastructuur.  ALGEMEEN: De huurprijs bedraagt € 4.350,-- per maand, inclusief stoffering, exclusief voorschot service- en stookkosten. De servicekosten bedragen € 650,- per maand. De voorschot stookkosten bedragen € 400,- per maand.  Totaal: € 5.400,00 per maand  De kosten voor een parkeerplaats zijn € 295,- per maand (optioneel). De servicekosten voor een parkeerplaats bedragen € 15,-- per maand.  Totaal: € 310,- per maand  ------------------------------------  “Résidence L’Étoile” ROYAL RENTING ON THE GELDERLANDPLEIN AND NEAR THE ZUIDAS.  Exclusive apartment, designed by Piet Boon. The apartment is fully equipped and situated at Van Leijenberghlaan Résidence L’Étoile, the square Gelderlandplein, near the ring road A -10 and the Zuidas.  There's nothing left to be desired. To begin with you have direct access to the parking garage under the building and the modern shopping mall to do your daily shopping.  On the ground floor, the spacious elegant lobby, a porter's lodge where a porter is available 24 hours a day to receive visitors and to announce to the residents.  In addition, Résidence L’Étoile has a PA (Personal Assistant ) service. The service can arrange of series of practical activities, from putting up a painting to organizing birthday parties and other gatherings.  You will also have exclusive use of a number of additional facilities.  On the first floor there is a spacious gym with modern fitness equipment. There is also a spa area with the beauty treatments, as well as massages and physiotherapy.  There are the guests rooms on the first floor. These luxurious rooms are equipped with every comfort. These can be booked exclusively for your guests  The apartment is located on the 2nd floor (on the east side) and was designed by Piet Boon. Layout: luxurious entrance, access to the living room with a sunny balcony and beautiful views. Luxury kitchen with built-in appliances. 3 bedrooms and 2 luxurious bathrooms.  LOCATION: The 'green ' Buitenveldertbaan is located near the Zuidas , Station Zuid / WTC Schiphol Airport, between South Amsterdam and Amstelveen. This is the part of Amsterdam is in full development. This creates a whole new international business center as well a range of shops, restaurants and other entertainment in the area. Live, work and play are combined in a dynamic and cosmopolitan neighborhood with unique infrastructure.  GENERAL: The rent is € 4.350,-- per month, including upholstery, exclusive payment service and heating costs. The service costs € 650,-- per month. The heating costs are  € 400,--  per month.  Total costs: € 5.400,- per month  The cost of a parking spot is € 295,-- per month (optional), service costs are 15,- per month.

Fantastic, spacious three-room  apartment  of no  less than  91 m2 in a  perfect  location in the center. Very  good  layout with a very spacious living  room  and  two good bedrooms.  The house has a lovely terrace. Everything is available in the immediate vicinity, from take-away meals to nice restaurants where life is good. Within a radius of 150 meters several supermarkets and diagonally below the house is even the famous Holtkamp pastry shop. In front of the door there is a metro stop of the north / south line. This is the perfect home to enjoy Amsterdam.  CHARACTERISTICS - Perfect location in the center - Subway entrance around the corner - 91 m2 living space - 24 months contract - Award by landlord - Readily available  LOCATION This apartment is located with the entrance in the Noorderstraat, a very quiet street where only local traffic drives. The Noorderstraat is located between the Vijzelstraat and the Utrechtsestraat and wonderfully close to the pleasant Amstelveld. Both the Vijzelgracht and the Utrechtsestraat are known for their nice shops and restaurants. A wonderful environment to live. It is very easy to reach by public transport, just across the street is the entrance to the North/South line (within approx. 20 minutes at Schiphol Airport). Parking is through a parking permit or paid parking.

Résidence La Palissade  is  a representative  apartment building  with elevators situated above  the  luxurious shopping center Gelderlandplein. Located  on  an internationally oriented part in the  South of Amsterdam you can  experience both the tranquility of the peaceful area and the dynamic atmosphere of the historical city. This high end residential property epitomizes the ideal city home and is quoted as one of the best and comfy in Amsterdam. Résidence La Palissade is perfectly positioned and just a few steps away from the business location of Amsterdam Zuidas, transportation to Schiphol and the world-famous city center, De RAI congress center, The British School of Amsterdam, well regarded childcare, luxurious shopping, Amstel Park and various sports, medical and health care clinic facilities. You are very welcome to experience Résidence La Palissade and we guarantee you a wonderful time in Amsterdam.   Résidence La Palissade contains several apartments all with excellent floor plans, a roof terrace or balcony, well equipped kitchens, and a storage in the basement or upper floor. Additional we offer a parking space in a secured parking garage just around the corner.   Van Leijenberghlaan 204 This well maintained 3-bedroom apartment of aprox. 130m² offers a spacious roof terrace of aprox. 66m², a nice living room with magnificent views, an open kitchen with build in equipment (Fridge, freezer, dish washer, oven and an extractor hood), 3 bedrooms, a bathroom with a shower, bath and washbasin furniture, towel radiator and a mirror with lightning, lavatory, indoor storage and an extra storage of aprox. 7m² at the mezzanine.  Specials: -Rent € 3.100,-- per month; -The rent is including upholstery; -Service charge € 90,00 a month;  -Three bedroom apartment;  -Available from today;  -Rented out by MVA CERTIFIED EXPAT BROKER.  -Property is not available for students and/or home sharers. Zeer luxe wonen  aan  de P.C.  Hooftstraat! Nieuw,  op het hoogste niveau,  gerenoveerd  dubbel benedenhuis met luxe inrichting,  2  slaapkamers met een privé badkamer, Wellness,  domotica bediening voor tv/sonos speakers,  gordijnen, vitrage en jaloezieën en een riant dakterras met privacy screen. Het appartement ligt aan het rustige gedeelte van de Pieter Cornelisz Hooftstraat op een toplocatie in Amsterdam Zuid. Links van de woning loopt u het Vondelpark in en rechts de exclusieve winkelstraat. In de directe omgeving is er genoeg keuze uit goede restaurants, cafe's, scholen en supermarkten en met 11 minuten lopen staat u op het Leidseplein. Daarnaast is er een goede verbinding van het openbaar vervoer naar de Zuidas (18 min), Amsterdam Centraal (20 min) of het Westerpark (17 min), Met de auto ben je eenvoudig op de ring A10.   Indeling:  Bel-etage: Entree, toilet, openslaande deuren naar de woonkamer en open keuken. Het zitgedeelte heeft een luxe cinewall met ingebouwde tv, speakers en gashaard. De luxe Gaggenau keuken is voorzien van alle gemakken zoals een wijnkoeler, extra brede koelkast, vriezer, oven, combi-oven, koffiemachine, quooker, kookplaat met ingebouwde afzuiginstallatie.   Via de bijkeuken is er toegang tot het riante dakterras. Het terras is voorzien van electrische screens om zelf te kunnen bepalen hoeveel schaduw/privacy is gewenst.  Soutterrain: In het soutterain zijn er twee slaapkamers beide voorzien van een tweepersoonsbed, privé badkamer en een op maat gemaakte kast met tv-voorbereiding. In de lange gang is een lange kastenwand aan beide kanten, waardoor een ruime inloopkast is ontstaan. Aan de achterzijde is er toegang tot het Welness gedeelte, hier kunt u genieten van een sauna, turks stoombad, of de hottub.  Bijzonderheden: - Luxe keuken met Gaggenau; - Domotica:  bediening tv, speakers, gordijnen via de "huis"tablet. - Airco; - Privé Wellness: Sauna, turks stoomcabine en Hottub; - Groot dakterras met electrisch screen voor privacy; - 2 slaapkamers met een eigen badkamer; - 3 toilets;  Dit appartement is per direct beschikbaar voor maximaal 2 jaar en kost €10.000,- per maand excl. g/w/e.

Fully renovated, atmospheric  and  well laid  out ground  floor apartment with a  lovely  sunny terrace on the water  of  the Lijnbaansgracht, located in the center  on the  edge of the Jordaan. The house is divided over the ground floor and basement and has a separate storage room in the basement. The bright living room and cozy living / dining kitchen are located on the first floor. From here there is a beautiful unobstructed view of the Marnixplantsoen at the front and the Lijnbaansgracht at the rear. In the basement there are two bedrooms and a modern bathroom with walk-in shower. The terrace of approx. 25 m2 is located on the southeast and has a beautiful view of houseboats and authentic ships.  LAYOUT The house is located on the ground floor and in the basement and has the following layout:  Ground floor: Entrance hall with stairs to the basement, toilet with fountain, Entry into the cozy living / dining kitchen at the front with various built-in appliances (refrigerator, combi microwave, 4-burner gas hob, extractor hood and dishwasher). The bright living room is located at the rear and has three windows with a beautiful view over the Lijnbaansgracht.  Basement: Landing, bedroom at the rear, second bedroom at the rear with access to the terrace. The modern bathroom has a walk-in shower, washbasin and design radiator. Separate storage in the basement.  LOCATION Marnixstraat connects Haarlemmerplein to Leidseplein, making it the western border of the Jordaan. In the immediate vicinity there are many nice shops, cafes and restaurants. There are also plenty of supermarkets in the area. On Saturdays you can visit the (organic) markets that are held at the nearby Noordermarkt and Lindengracht for fresh products. The Haarlemmerstraat with, among other things, the Movies cinema and the Westerpark is nearby. Sports complex Het Marnix (including swimming pool, fitness and spa) is a 2-minute walk away.  ACCESSIBILITY AND PARKING The apartment is easily accessible by car from the A-10 ring road (via S 103 or S105) and there are several bus and tram stops (including tram lines 3 and 5, bus lines 18 and 21) nearby. Within 10 minutes cycling you are at the Central Station. Parking is via a permit system. Paid parking on public roads is from Monday to Saturday from 9:00 to 24:00 hrs. and on Sunday from 12:00 to 24:00 hrs. (see website of the Municipality of Amsterdam).  PARTICULARITIES - Lovely terrace at the rear adjacent to the water of the Lijnbaansgracht.  - 2 bedrooms - Wooden frames with double glazing (HR ++ glass) - Unobstructed view on the front (Eerste Marnixplantsoen) and the rear (Lijnbaansgracht). - Separate storage in the basement. - Located in the center of Amsterdam, on the edge of the Jordaan with all amenities within easy reach.

Welcome to a  truly  unique opportunity  to live  in a beautiful, 4-bedroom,  2-bathroom  house with a private garden  and  a historic link to one of  the  most  famous painters ever  lived, named Rembrandt van Rijn.   The property is directly available for rent and will be offered in a fully furnished condition.  The monthly rental price is excluding utilities which are approx. € 300,- per month.   Background and history:  The original building (named ‘De Blauwe Arent’), was built around 1612 and once owned by the ‘Six’ family. A Dutch aristocratic family that became wealthy through the silk and cloth industry. Their son, named Jan Six, has lived in the building up to around the year 1654 until he left to live on Herengracht 619 when it was completed.   Jan Six and Rembrandt became friends and Rembrandt has made a world famous etch of Jan Six in 1647 in front of the window of this very building. The etch is part of the Collection Six and is still owned by the family. It has been in several expositions and we have attached a picture of the etch to this advertisement.   Layout of the house: Wide staircase up to the upper ground floor on the outside of the building. Through the beautiful, half-moon shaped front door you reach the communal entrance hallway with ornamented ceilings and a marble floor.   Private entrance on the right side of the hallway.  Hallway with wardrobe space and built-in wardrobe / storage on the side.   The grand living space of approx. 70sqm and 3.6m ceiling height has a beautiful view over the canal and surrounding area. All the original ornaments of the ceiling have been preserved and it truly has a special feeling of being in this historic room where Rembrandt van Rijn has etched his friend, Jan Six.   Towards the back of this level, there is a spacious living kitchen which has been upgraded to modern standards. The kitchen is fully equipped with a large refrigerator/freezer, dishwasher, 5-burner gas stove, oven/microwave combination and plenty of storage space.  There are two very large (double glazed) windows that let through a lot of natural daylight and give a nice view over the garden.   Through the inner staircase, you can reach the lower ground floor with all the bed- and bathrooms. There is a separate toilet with fountain situated next to the staircase.   The primary bedroom is furnished with a comfortable double bed and built-in wardrobe. The second bedroom is furnished with a single bed with an antique wooden frame.  There is also an extra built-in wardrobe situated in the hallway.   The bathroom is equipped with a bath tub, separate walk-in shower, washbasin and storage.  The washing machine and dryer are situated behind the bathroom in a separate area.   Towards the back, behind the bathroom and laundry area, the 3rd (bed)room / office area is situated. It’s a very bright room with direct access to the private garden of the house.   Studio / guest apartment:  Through the hallway on the lower ground level, you can reach the separated studio apartment at the front side of the building.   The studio apartment is 60sqm and has a separate bedroom and private bathroom.  It is fully furnished and has a fully functional kitchen with refrigerator/freezer, gas stove and oven.  It can ideally be used for an au-pair or guests that could have their complete privacy and separate entrance on the front side on the street.   The entire apartment has been renovated (2023) and updated to all modern standards, including double glazing. Every square meter has been looked at and improved so that the new resident can enjoy this special place in all comfort!   Furthermore, at the back of the building, which can be reached through the communal hallway on the upper ground floor, there is a communal garden in between the buildings of Kloveniersburgwal and Groenburgwal.   Lastly, there is a secure bicycle storage underneath the building that can be accessed directly from the street.   Location:  The house is very well situated within the historical city center of Amsterdam.  This part of Kloveniersburgwal has mostly residential buildings and is surprisingly quiet. In the direct vicinity there is you can find Hotel De L’Europe, Hotel The Grand, TOBACCO theater but also plenty of public transportation options through Rokin, Rembrandtplein or Nieuwmarkt. Many shops, restaurants and supermarkets are all within walkin distance oc the house.  You can reach the rest of city and other neighborhoods like Oud-Zuid or De Pijp within 10 minutes by bicycle.   Please contact Bas Bakker from Listings about any inquires / viewing requests.
